contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentLabel: Did you know that Kentico turned 20 years old?
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentShortDescription:
Longest running Kentico MVP, Jeroen Fürst, reflects on what being a part of the Kentico community for so many years has meant to him now that Kentico is celebrating its 20th anniversary.
Thanks Jeroen!
